title: Samourai Wallet’s Keonne Rodriguez sentenced to maximum five-year term over crypto mixing service
contentSnippet: Samourai Wallet co-founder Keonne Rodriguez was sentenced to five years in prison and ordered to pay a quarter-million dollar fine on Thursday.

title: Stellar Faces Renewed Selling Pressure as XLM Reverses From Key Resistance
contentSnippet: Stellar (XLM) slid 2.2% amid heavy selling at the $0.2815 resistance level, confirming continued bearish momentum as volume spiked.

title: Developer of Bitcoin App Samourai Sentenced to 5 Years in Prison
contentSnippet: Samourai Wallet developer Keonne Rodriguez was sentenced Thursday to five years in prison for his role in creating a Bitcoin mixer app.

title: Google Finance to roll out Polymarket and Kalshi prediction markets data in search results
contentSnippet: Google said prediction markets data from leading platforms Polymarket and Kalshi will roll out over the coming weeks.

title: HBAR Slips 2.6% to $0.1691 as Support Test Draws Heavy Volume
contentSnippet: Hedera’s native token rebounds after a sharp 2.6% drop, with rising volume and a confirmed double-bottom pattern signaling potential upside toward $0.1730.

title: Robinhood cautious on adopting corporate bitcoin treasury: ‘Is it the best use of our capital?’
contentSnippet: Robinhood’s crypto revenue rose 300% to $268 million in the third quarter, helping drive higher overall revenues of $1.27 billion.

title: Bitcoin’s Fair Value Is $170K, JPMorgan Argues in Gold-Based Model
contentSnippet: Using risk capital metrics, the bank says BTC should match two-thirds of gold's private investment base, up from $102K now.

title: How This Crypto Influencer Won a $200K Bet by Predicting the Bitcoin Crash
contentSnippet: A pair of crypto influencers wagered $100K each on whether Bitcoin would rise or fall. Here's how it all went down.

title: Samourai Wallet Developer Sentenced to 5 Years in Prison for Unlicensed Money Transmitting
contentSnippet: District Judge Denise Cote sentenced Keonne Rodriguez to the statutory maximum. Fellow developer William Lonergan Hill will be sentenced later this month.

title: Crypto Shares Slammed, BTC Heads Back to $100K Alongside Thursday Stock Market Selloff
contentSnippet: Continuing a steep slide begun in July, Michael Saylor's Strategy has now turned lower on a year-over-year basis.

title: Synthetic stablecoin USDX depegs below $0.60, PancakeSwap and Lista monitoring the situation
contentSnippet: USDX, which had an all-time circulating supply of $683 million, is trading below $0.60, raising concerns of potential defaults.

title: UK Stablecoin Rules Will Be in Place 'as Quickly as the U.S.,' BOE Says: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: BOE Deputy Governor Sarah Breeden tied the need to impose caps on stablecoin holdings to the U.K.'s mortgage market, which relies on commercial bank lending.

title: BONK Slides 4% as Support Break Sparks Renewed Technical Weakness
contentSnippet: BONK declines 4.06% to $0.00001174 as failed resistance test triggers downside momentum amid rising volume.

title: BTC Holding $102K! ZEC Skyrockets! Ripple raise $500M!
contentSnippet: Crypto markets were slightly green, with Bitcoin trading just below its 200-week moving average—BTC rose 0.5% to $102,800, while ETH gained 1% to $3,380. BNB and SOL remained flat at $950 and $157, re

title: Crypto for Advisors: What is DeFi?
contentSnippet: DeFi can be misunderstood, but it's key to investing's future. Learn about the tech, adoption trends, and how advisors can win with clarity.

title: Central Bank of Ireland fines Coinbase Europe $25 million for breaching anti-money laundering monitoring obligations
contentSnippet: The bank said more than 30 million transactions were not properly monitored, which led to 2,708 late suspicious transaction reports.

title: Cross-chain trading app Fomo raises $17 million in round led by Benchmark
contentSnippet: Fomo said with its app users can maintain one balance across multiple chains and don't have to worry about bridges or gas fees.

title: Cathie Wood trims bitcoin bull case by $300,000 as stablecoins ‘usurp’ part of its key use case
contentSnippet: Her comments come as institutions recalibrate BTC forecasts, with Galaxy turning cautious and JPMorgan projecting renewed upside.

title: JPMorgan sees bitcoin price reaching about $170,000 within the next 6 to 12 months
contentSnippet: Bitcoin could climb to around $170,000 over the next 6–12 months based on its volatility-adjusted comparison to gold, according to JPMorgan.

title: UK Stablecoin Regs Coming 'Just as Quickly' as US: Bank of England
contentSnippet: BoE deputy governor Sarah Breeden rebuffed crypto industry concerns that the UK is falling behind in the global race to regulate stablecoins.

title: The Fed's Turning Hawkish as This U.S. Employment Indicator Flashes Red
contentSnippet: Challenger job cuts for October rose to their highest in more than 20 years.

title: Dormant Bitcoin Comes Back to Life as 4.65M BTC Reenters Circulation in 2025
contentSnippet: Data shows long-term holders have driven an unprecedented wave of distribution across 2024 and 2025.

title: Central Bank of Ireland Fines Coinbase Europe $24.8M for AML Failures
contentSnippet: Ireland has issued its first crypto enforcement action as Coinbase Europe admits flaws in monitoring 30 million transactions.

title: Arx Research raises $6.1 million seed round to launch ‘Burner Terminal’ stablecoin and fiat point-of-sale device
contentSnippet: The seed round was led by Castle Island Ventures, with participation from Inflection, Placeholder, Seed Club Ventures, and 1kx.

title: Solana, Fireblocks, Monad and more ally to standardize cross-chain payments
contentSnippet: In recent months, payments appears to have become a large focus among many key players in the world of crypto.

title: ASIC Chief Warns Australia Risks Losing Edge as Global Markets Embrace Tokenization
contentSnippet: The Australian regulator warned the country could become a "land of missed opportunity" as other markets race ahead on tokenization.

title: Bitcoin Could Bounce, Headwinds Can Turn into Tailwinds: Tom Lee
contentSnippet: Fundstrat's Tom Lee says Bitcoin's slump was due to macro headwinds, but sees a potential reversal as pressures ease.

title: Three Big Crypto Takeaways From Robinhood’s Quarterly Announcement
contentSnippet: Robinhood executives said prediction markets are gaining traction and crypto trading remains strong, as the company looks to expand overseas.

title: Circle Updates Terms of Service to Allow ‘Legal’ Firearm Purchases With USDC
contentSnippet: The USDC policy reversal on firearm purchases suggests that “stablecoins are at the whims of politicians,” an industry expert told Decrypt.

title: Bitcoin’s Relief Rally Lifts Spirits: Is it Time to Buy the Dip?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s rebound above $100,000 has revived hopes of a recovery, but analysts warn the bounce may be more technical than fundamental.
